summary: This is an internal Bureau of Prisons email from July 30, 2019, stating that inmate Jeffrey Epstein is being taken off of Psych Observation and needs to be housed with an appropriate cellmate. The document also includes subsequent pages showing a distribution list and read receipts for the message.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate referenced in the email, identified by his BOP number #76318-054, who is being taken off Psych Observation.

events.title: Epstein Removed from Psych Observation
events.description: An internal BOP email states that inmate Jeffrey Epstein is being taken off of Psych Observation and needs to be housed with an appropriate cellmate.

keyFacts: On July 30, 2019, Jeffrey Epstein was officially taken off of Psych Observation status while in BOP custody.
The email directive states he needed to be housed with an 'appropriate cellmate' following his removal from observation.
The document shows the message was widely distributed within the BOP, with a list of 71 recipients and various read statuses tracked.
This administrative change occurred approximately two weeks before Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
